column4: I have been up all night trying to get ubuntu on my mac mini, using both amd 64 and regular 32 bit, both hardy en interprid, both ubuntu and xubuntu, and still get the flashing ?
are you setting it up into a virtual machine, or using bootcamp ?
bootcamp sorta

I just boot the cd, install, 6) Reboot and remember: every time you want to run Ubuntu Linux, you’ll have to keep the alt key pressed during boot and choose “Windows” (Yes, really) from the boot menu that opens.
i'm not following you, tell me everything you did, slow

Alright, I installed (litteraly tried all versions) ubuntu  using entire mac mini disk (80 gig)  79 as / (being bootable) and 1 gb as swap. NO osx, no bootcamp. it installs flawless (both alternative and live cd works to install with) I reboot, hold down alt.. nothing shows up, HELP ME SOMEONE
so you can't start ubuntu, nor start something else ?
exactly, I just got ubuntu though I dont want OS X
it doesnt find it, no offence man, but do you got experienec with installing on a mac?
i'm a exp. mac user
you used the live CD to install, or the alternate install
I GOT both.. 100 different versions of them
none of them working... i understand
they work installing
but nothing more.. they dont boot, just flashing -> ? that is questin mark
When I boot OS X disc, and check disc utility, all I can see is swap on 1 gig, and 79 free space sorta...
yeah.
never happened to me before
i had 2 flawless ubuntu installs (8.04) on macs using the live CD...
how did you do?
just by running it... i never encountered your problem
